  border-radius: inherit;

  opacity: 0;
  position: absolute;
}
.MuiTouchRipple-rippleVisible {
  opacity: 0.3;
  animation: MuiTouchRipple-keyframes-enter 550ms cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
  transform: scale(1);
}
.MuiTouchRipple-ripplePulsate {
  animation-duration: 200ms;
}
.MuiTouchRipple-child {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  display: block;
  opacity: 1;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background-color: currentColor;
}
.MuiTouchRipple-childLeaving {
  opacity: 0;
  animation: MuiTouchRipple-keyframes-exit 550ms cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
}
.MuiTouchRipple-childPulsate {
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  position: absolute;
  animation: MuiTouchRipple-keyframes-pulsate 2500ms cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1) 200ms infinite;
}
@-webkit-keyframes MuiTouchRipple-keyframes-enter {
  0% {
    opacity: 0.1;
    transform: scale(0);
  }
  100% {
    opacity: 0.3;
    transform: scale(1);
  }
}
@-webkit-keyframes MuiTouchRipple-keyframes-exit {
  0% {
    opacity: 1;
  }
  100% {
    opacity: 0;
  }
}
@-webkit-keyframes MuiTouchRipple-keyframes-pulsate {
  0% {
    transform: scale(1);
  }
  50% {
    transform: scale(0.92);
  }
  100% {
    transform: scale(1);
  }
}

	.box-query .box-legend>span {
		background-color: hsl(212, 77%, 47%, 1);
	}

		background-color: black;
	}

		background-color: hsl(180, 8%, 40%);
	}

		background-color: hsl(240, 67%, 62%);

  _paq.push(["setDocumentTitle", document.domain + "/" + document.title]);
  _paq.push(["setCookieDomain", "*.libretexts.org"]);
  _paq.push(["setDoNotTrack", true]);
  _paq.push(['trackPageView']);
  _paq.push(['enableLinkTracking']);

    var u="//matomo-test-ecs.libretexts.org/";
    _paq.push(['setTrackerUrl', u+'matomo.php']);
    _paq.push(['setSiteId', '4']);

    transform: translate(-15px);
    font-size: x-large;
}

    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
}

    background-image: linear-gradient(90deg, #0000F4, #000000, #E93323);
    color: #ffffff;

    color: #ffffff;
}

    position: absolute;
}

    border-radius: 10px;

    width: 2rem;

.MathJax .merror {background-color: #FFFF88; color: #CC0000; border: 1px solid #CC0000; padding: 1px 3px; font-style: normal; font-size: 90%}
.MathJax .MJX-monospace {font-family: monospace}
.MathJax .MJX-sans-serif {font-family: sans-serif}
#MathJax_Tooltip {background-color: InfoBackground; color: InfoText; border: 1px solid black; box-shadow: 2px 2px 5px #AAAAAA; -webkit-box-shadow: 2px 2px 5px #AAAAAA; -moz-box-shadow: 2px 2px 5px #AAAAAA; -khtml-box-shadow: 2px 2px 5px #AAAAAA; filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.dropshadow(OffX=2, OffY=2, Color='gray', Positive='true'); padding: 3px 4px; z-index: 401; position: absolute; left: 0; top: 0; width: auto; height: auto; display: none}
.MathJax {display: inline; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; line-height: normal; font-size: 100%; font-size-adjust: none; text-indent: 0; text-align: left; text-transform: none; letter-spacing: normal; word-spacing: normal; word-wrap: normal; white-space: nowrap; float: none; direction: ltr; max-width: none; max-height: none; min-width: 0; min-height: 0; border: 0; padding: 0; margin: 0}
.MathJax:focus, body :focus .MathJax {display: inline-table}
.MathJax.MathJax_FullWidth {text-align: center; display: table-cell!important; width: 10000em!important}
.MathJax img, .MathJax nobr, .MathJax a {border: 0; padding: 0; margin: 0; max-width: none; max-height: none; min-width: 0; min-height: 0; vertical-align: 0; line-height: normal; text-decoration: none}
img.MathJax_strut {border: 0!important; padding: 0!important; margin: 0!important; vertical-align: 0!important}
.MathJax span {display: inline; position: static; border: 0; padding: 0; margin: 0; vertical-align: 0; line-height: normal; text-decoration: none}
.MathJax nobr {white-space: nowrap!important}
.MathJax img {display: inline!important; float: none!important}
.MathJax * {transition: none; -webkit-transition: none; -moz-transition: none; -ms-transition: none; -o-transition: none}
.MathJax_Processing {visibility: hidden; position: fixed; width: 0; height: 0; overflow: hidden}
.MathJax_Processed {display: none!important}
.MathJax_ExBox {display: block!important; overflow: hidden; width: 1px; height: 60ex; min-height: 0; max-height: none}
.MathJax .MathJax_EmBox {display: block!important; overflow: hidden; width: 1px; height: 60em; min-height: 0; max-height: none}
.MathJax_LineBox {display: table!important}
.MathJax_LineBox span {display: table-cell!important; width: 10000em!important; min-width: 0; max-width: none; padding: 0; border: 0; margin: 0}
.MathJax .MathJax_HitBox {cursor: text; background: white; opacity: 0; filter: alpha(opacity=0)}
.MathJax .MathJax_HitBox * {filter: none; opacity: 1; background: transparent}
#MathJax_Tooltip * {filter: none; opacity: 1; background: transparent}

  'overlayBackgroundColor': '#fff',
  'overlayOpacity': 0.9,

  'spinnerIDName': 'spinner',
});

    JsLoadingOverlay.hide();
});

    /* prefix for generated unique id attributes, which are required 
           to indicate aria-owns, aria-controls and aria-labelledby */
    uuidPrefix: "accessible-megamenu",

    /* css class used to define the megamenu styling */
    menuClass: "toolbar_menu",

    /* css class for a top-level navigation item in the megamenu */

<div id="header-buttons"><button class="header-btn" id="enter_reader"><span aria-hidden="true" class="material-symbols-outlined" focusable="false">chrome_reader_mode</span> <span>Enter Reader Mode</span></button></div>

<script type="text/javascript">/*<![CDATA[*/
let enterReaderBtn = document.getElementById('enter_reader');
["click", "keypress"].forEach(ev=>{
    enterReaderBtn.addEventListener(ev, function(e){
        e.preventDefault();
        if (e.keyCode === 13 || ev == 'click') {
            window.open(window.location.href + '?readerView', '_self');
        }
    })
});

if (window.location.href.indexOf('?readerView')){
  document.getElementById('readerview_wrapper').style.display = 'block';
}/*]]>*/</script>
</nav>

<script type="text/javascript" src="https://cdn.libretexts.net/github/LibreTextsMain/Miscellaneous/copyNavigation.js"></script>







<script type="text/javascript">/*<![CDATA[*/
function createLaunchpadElement() {
try {
    // Get target <ol> element
    const elementArr = document.querySelectorAll('.elm-header-user-nav');
    const navContainer = elementArr.item(0);
    if(!navContainer) throw new Error('Nav container does not exist');
    const navContainerChildren = navContainer.getElementsByTagName('ol');
    if(!navContainerChildren) throw new Error('Could not get nav container child elements');
    const targetElement = navContainerChildren.item(0);
    if(!targetElement) throw new Error('Target element does not exist');

    //Create <li>
    const newListItem = document.createElement('li');
    const newDiv = document.createElement('div');
    newDiv.setAttribute('id', 'widget-parent');
    newListItem.appendChild(newDiv);

     //Prepend new <li> to target <ol> element
    targetElement.prepend(newListItem);

    // Add appropriate styling
    targetElement.style.alignItems = 'center';
    newDiv.style.marginRight = '1em';
} catch (err) {
    console.error(err);
}
}

function loadLaunchpadScript() {
    try {
        const script = document.createElement('script');
        script.src = "https://cdn.libretexts.net/libreone-launchpad-widget.min.js";
        document.head.appendChild(script);
    } catch (err) {
        console.error(err)
    }
}

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', (event) => {
    createLaunchpadElement();
    loadLaunchpadScript();
});/*]]>*/</script>

<h1 id="title" data-title-editor-available="false">
        Heisenberg's Uncertainty Principle
</h1>

<script type="text/javascript">/*<![CDATA[*/
//CORS override
LibreTexts.getKeys().then(()=>{
    if(!$.ajaxOld){
        $.ajaxOld = $.ajax;
        $.ajax = (url, options)=> {
   
            if(url.url && url.url.includes('.libretexts.org/@api/deki/files')) {
                let [subdomain, path] = LibreTexts.parseURL();
                let token = LibreTexts.getKeys.keys[subdomain];
                url.headers = Object.assign(url.headers || {}, {'x-deki-token':token});
            }
            else if (typeof url === 'string' && url.includes('.libretexts.org/@api/deki/files')){
            let [subdomain, path] = LibreTexts.parseURL();
            let token = LibreTexts.getKeys.keys[subdomain];
               options.headers = Object.assign(options.headers || {}, {'x-deki-token':token});
            }
            return $.ajaxOld(url, options);
    }
    }
});/*]]>*/</script>

id="MJXp-Span-59"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-59">\newcommand{\fourvec}[4]{\left[\begin{array}{r}#1 \\ #2 \\ #3 \\ #4 \end{array}\right]}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-60"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-60">\newcommand{\cfourvec}[4]{\left[\begin{array}{c}#1 \\ #2 \\ #3 \\ #4 \end{array}\right]}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-61"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-61">\newcommand{\fivevec}[5]{\left[\begin{array}{r}#1 \\ #2 \\ #3 \\ #4 \\ #5 \\ \end{array}\right]}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-62"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-62">\newcommand{\cfivevec}[5]{\left[\begin{array}{c}#1 \\ #2 \\ #3 \\ #4 \\ #5 \\ \end{array}\right]}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-63"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-63">\newcommand{\mattwo}[4]{\left[\begin{array}{rr}#1 \amp #2 \\ #3 \amp #4 \\ \end{array}\right]}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-64"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-64">\newcommand{\laspan}[1]{\text{Span}\{#1\}}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-65"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-65">\newcommand{\bcal}{\cal B}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-66"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-66">\newcommand{\ccal}{\cal C}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-67"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-67">\newcommand{\scal}{\cal S}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-68"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-68">\newcommand{\wcal}{\cal W}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-69"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-69">\newcommand{\ecal}{\cal E}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-70"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-70">\newcommand{\coords}[2]{\left\{#1\right\}_{#2}}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-71"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-71">\newcommand{\gray}[1]{\color{gray}{#1}}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-72"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-72">\newcommand{\lgray}[1]{\color{lightgray}{#1}}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-73"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-73">\newcommand{\rank}{\operatorname{rank}}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-74"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-74">\newcommand{\row}{\text{Row}}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-75"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-75">\newcommand{\col}{\text{Col}}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-76"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-76">\renewcommand{\row}{\text{Row}}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-77"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-77">\newcommand{\nul}{\text{Nul}}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-78"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-78">\newcommand{\var}{\text{Var}}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-79"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-79">\newcommand{\corr}{\text{corr}}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-80"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-80">\newcommand{\len}[1]{\left|#1\right|}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-81"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-81">\newcommand{\bbar}{\overline{\bvec}}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-82"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-82">\newcommand{\bhat}{\widehat{\bvec}}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-83"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-83">\newcommand{\bperp}{\bvec^\perp}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-84"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-84">\newcommand{\xhat}{\widehat{\xvec}}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-85"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-85">\newcommand{\vhat}{\widehat{\vvec}}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-86"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-86">\newcommand{\uhat}{\widehat{\uvec}}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-87"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-87">\newcommand{\what}{\widehat{\wvec}}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-88"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-88">\newcommand{\Sighat}{\widehat{\Sigma}}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-89"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-89">\newcommand{\lt}{<}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-90"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-90">\newcommand{\gt}{>}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-91"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-91">\newcommand{\amp}{&}</script> <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-92"></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-92">\definecolor{fillinmathshade}{gray}{0.9}</script></div>
</header>
                <aside class="mt-content-side"></aside>
            <aside id="mt-toc-container" data-title="Table of contents" data-collapsed="true" class="mt-toggle-container"><button class="mt-toggle mt-summary-toggle ui-button-icon mt-toggle-expand" type="button">Table of contents</button>
                <nav class="mt-toc-content mt-collapsible-section" style="border: none; margin: 0px; max-height: 0px; overflow: hidden; padding: 0px; transition: max-height cubic-bezier(0, 1, 0, 1);">
                    <ol><li><a href="#Introduction" rel="internal">Introduction</a></li><li><a href="#What_does_it_mean.3F" rel="internal">What does it mean?</a></li><li><a href="#Consequences" rel="internal">Consequences</a></li><li><a href="#Problems" rel="internal">Problems</a></li><li><a href="#Answers" rel="internal">Answers</a></li><li><a href="#References" rel="internal">References</a></li><li><a href="#Contributors_and_Attributions" rel="internal">Contributors and Attributions</a></li></ol>
                </nav>
            </aside>
            <section class="mt-content-container">
                <p class="lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;">Heisenberg’s Uncertainty Principle is one of the most celebrated results of quantum mechanics and states that one (often, but not always) cannot know all things about a particle (as it is defined by it’s wave function) at the same time. This principle is mathematically manifested as <a title="Physical Chemistry/Quantum Mechanics/Commuting Operators" href="https://chem.libretexts.org/Bookshelves/Physical_and_Theoretical_Chemistry_Textbook_Maps/Supplemental_Modules_(Physical_and_Theoretical_Chemistry)/Quantum_Mechanics/02._Fundamental_Concepts_of_Quantum_Mechanics/Heisenberg's_Uncertainty_Principle/Commuting_Operators" rel="internal">non-commuting operators</a>.</p>

<div mt-section-origin="Bookshelves/Physical_and_Theoretical_Chemistry_Textbook_Maps/Supplemental_Modules_(Physical_and_Theoretical_Chemistry)/Quantum_Mechanics/02._Fundamental_Concepts_of_Quantum_Mechanics/Heisenberg's_Uncertainty_Principle" class="mt-section" id="section_1"><span id="Introduction"></span><h2 class="lt-chem-1693 editable" style="background-color: unset;">Introduction</h2>

<p class="lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;">Heisenberg's Uncertainty Principle states that there is inherent uncertainty in the act of measuring a variable of a particle<span style="visibility:visible;"><span style="visibility:visible;">. Commonly applied to the position and momentum of a particle, the principle states that the more precisely the position is known the more uncertain the momentum is and vice versa. This is contrary to classical Newtonian physics which holds all variables of particles to be measurable to an arbitrary uncertainty given good enough equipment.</span></span> The Heisenberg Uncertainty Principle is a fundamental theory in quantum mechanics that defines why a scientist cannot measure multiple quantum variables simultaneously. Until the dawn of quantum mechanics, it was held as a fact that all variables of an object could be known to exact precision simultaneously for a given moment. Newtonian physics placed no limits on how better procedures and techniques could reduce measurement uncertainty so that it was conceivable that with proper care and accuracy all information could be defined. Heisenberg made the bold proposition that there is a lower limit to this precision making our knowledge of a particle inherently uncertain.</p>

<p class="lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;">More specifically, if one knows the precise momentum of the particle, it is impossible to know the precise position, and vice versa. This relationship also applies to energy and time, in that one cannot measure the precise energy of a system in a finite amount of time. Uncertainties in the products of “conjugate pairs” (momentum/position) and (energy/time) were defined by Heisenberg as having a minimum value corresponding to Planck’s constant divided by <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-93"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-94">4</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-95">π</span></span></span><span class="MathJax MathJax_Processed" id="MathJax-Element-93-Frame" tabindex="0" style=""><nobr><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-185"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0em; height: 0px; font-size: 107%;"><span style="position: absolute;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-186"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-187" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-188" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.003em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></nobr></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-93">4\pi</script>. More clearly:</p>

<p class="mt-align-center lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math MJXp-display" id="MJXp-Span-96"><span class="MJXp-mtable" id="MJXp-Span-97"><span><span class="MJXp-mlabeledtr" id="MJXp-Span-98" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-99" style="text-align: center;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-100">Δ</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-101"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-102">p</span></span><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-103">Δ</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-104"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-105">x</span></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-106" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">≥</span><span class="MJXp-mstyle" id="MJXp-Span-107"><span class="MJXp-mfrac" id="MJXp-Span-108" style="vertical-align: 0.25em;"><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-109">h</span></span><span class="MJXp-box" style="margin-top: -0.9em;"><span class="MJXp-denom"><span><span class="MJXp-rule" style="height: 1em; border-top: none; border-bottom: 1px solid; margin: 0.1em 0px;"></span></span><span><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-110">4</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-111">π</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><div class="MathJax_Display MathJax_Processing"><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-94-Frame" tabindex="0"></span></div><script type="math/tex; mode=display" id="MathJax-Element-94">\Delta{p}\Delta{x} \ge \dfrac{h}{4\pi}</script></p>

<p class="mt-align-center lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math MJXp-display" id="MJXp-Span-112"><span class="MJXp-mtable" id="MJXp-Span-113"><span><span class="MJXp-mlabeledtr" id="MJXp-Span-114" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-115" style="text-align: center;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-116">Δ</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-117"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-118">t</span></span><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-119">Δ</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-120"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-121">E</span></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-122" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">≥</span><span class="MJXp-mstyle" id="MJXp-Span-123"><span class="MJXp-mfrac" id="MJXp-Span-124" style="vertical-align: 0.25em;"><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-125">h</span></span><span class="MJXp-box" style="margin-top: -0.9em;"><span class="MJXp-denom"><span><span class="MJXp-rule" style="height: 1em; border-top: none; border-bottom: 1px solid; margin: 0.1em 0px;"></span></span><span><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-126">4</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-127">π</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><div class="MathJax_Display MathJax_Processing"><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-95-Frame" tabindex="0"></span></div><script type="math/tex; mode=display" id="MathJax-Element-95">\Delta{t}\Delta{E} \ge \dfrac{h}{4\pi}</script></p>

<p class="lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;">Where <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-128"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-129">Δ</span></span></span><span class="MathJax MathJax_Processing" id="MathJax-Element-96-Frame" tabindex="0"></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-96">\Delta</script> refers to the uncertainty in that variable and h is Planck's constant.</p>

<p class="lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;">Aside from the mathematical definitions, one can make sense of this by imagining that the more carefully one tries to measure position, the more disruption there is to the system, resulting in changes in momentum. For example compare the effect that measuring the position has on the momentum of an electron versus a tennis ball. Let’s say to measure these objects, light is required in the form of photon particles. These photon particles have a measurable mass and velocity, and come into contact with the electron and tennis ball in order to achieve a value in their position. As two objects collide with their respective momenta (p=m*v), they impart theses momenta onto each other. When the photon contacts the electron, a portion of its momentum is transferred and the electron will now move relative to this value depending on the ratio of their mass. The larger tennis ball when measured will have a transfer of momentum from the photons as well, but the effect will be lessened because its mass is several orders of magnitude larger than the photon. To give a more practical description, picture a tank and a bicycle colliding with one another, the tank portraying the tennis ball and the bicycle that of the photon. The sheer mass of the tank although it may be traveling at a much slower speed will increase its momentum much higher than that of the bicycle in effect forcing the bicycle in the opposite direction. The final result of measuring an object’s position leads to a change in its momentum and vice versa.</p>

<p class="lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;">All Quantum behavior follows this principle and it is important in determining spectral line widths, as the uncertainty in energy of a system corresponds to a line width seen in regions of the light spectrum explored in Spectroscopy.</p>

</div><div mt-section-origin="Bookshelves/Physical_and_Theoretical_Chemistry_Textbook_Maps/Supplemental_Modules_(Physical_and_Theoretical_Chemistry)/Quantum_Mechanics/02._Fundamental_Concepts_of_Quantum_Mechanics/Heisenberg's_Uncertainty_Principle" class="mt-section" id="section_2"><span id="What_does_it_mean.3F"></span><h2 class="lt-chem-1693 editable" style="background-color: unset;"><span>What does it mean?</span></h2>

<p class="lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;">It is hard to imagine not being able to know exactly where a particle is at a given moment. It seems intuitive that if a particle exists in space, then we can point to where it is; however, the Heisenberg Uncertainty Principle clearly shows otherwise<span style="visibility:visible;"><span style="visibility:visible;">. This is because of the wave-like nature of a particle. A particle is spread out over space so that there simply is not a precise location that it occupies, but instead occupies a range of positions. Similarly, the momentum cannot be precisely known since a particle consists of a packet of waves, each of which have their own momentum so that at best it can be said that a particle has a range of momentum.</span></span></p>

<figure><img alt="Wave_packet_(dispersion).gif" style="width: 200px; height: 125px;" width="200px" height="125px" class="internal" loading="lazy" src="https://chem.libretexts.org/@api/deki/files/8973/Wave_packet_(dispersion).gif?revision=1&amp;size=bestfit&amp;width=200&amp;height=125">
<figcaption>Figure <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-130"><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-131"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-132">1</span></span></span></span><span class="MathJax MathJax_Processing" id="MathJax-Element-97-Frame" tabindex="0"></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-97">\PageIndex{1}</script><span style="visibility:visible;"><span style="visibility:visible;">: A wave packet in space</span></span></figcaption>
</figure>

<p class="lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;"><span style="visibility:visible;"><span style="visibility:visible;">Let's consider if quantum variables could be measured exactly. A </span></span>wave that has a perfectly measurable position is collapsed onto a single point with an indefinite wavelength and therefore indefinite momentum according to de Broglie's equation. Similarly, a wave with a perfectly measurable momentum has a wavelength that oscillates over all space infinitely and therefore has an indefinite position.</p>

<p class="lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;">You could do the same thought experiment with energy and time. To precisely measure a wave's energy would take an infinite amount of time while measuring a wave's exact instance in space would require to be collapsed onto a single moment which would have indefinite energy.</p>

</div><div mt-section-origin="Bookshelves/Physical_and_Theoretical_Chemistry_Textbook_Maps/Supplemental_Modules_(Physical_and_Theoretical_Chemistry)/Quantum_Mechanics/02._Fundamental_Concepts_of_Quantum_Mechanics/Heisenberg's_Uncertainty_Principle" class="mt-section" id="section_3"><span id="Consequences"></span><h2 class="lt-chem-1693 editable" style="background-color: unset;"><span>Consequences</span></h2>

<p class="lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;">The Heisenberg Principle has large bearing on practiced science and how experiments are designed. Consider measuring the momentum or position of a particle. To create a measurement, an interaction with the particle must occur that will alter it's other variables. For example, in order to measure the position of an electron there must be a collision between the electron and another particle such as a photon. This will impart some of the second particle's momentum onto the electron being measured and thereby altering it. A more accurate measurement of the electron's position would require a particle with a smaller wavelength, and therefore be more energetic, but then this would alter the momentum even more during collision. An experiment designed to determine momentum would have a similar effect on position. Consequently, experiments can only gather information about a single variable at a time with any amount of accuracy.</p>

</div><div mt-section-origin="Bookshelves/Physical_and_Theoretical_Chemistry_Textbook_Maps/Supplemental_Modules_(Physical_and_Theoretical_Chemistry)/Quantum_Mechanics/02._Fundamental_Concepts_of_Quantum_Mechanics/Heisenberg's_Uncertainty_Principle" class="mt-section" id="section_4"><span id="Problems"></span><h2 class="lt-chem-1693 editable" style="background-color: unset;">Problems</h2>

<ol>
    <li class="lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;">The uncertainty in the momentum <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-133"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-134">Δ</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-135"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-136">p</span></span></span></span><span class="MathJax MathJax_Processing" id="MathJax-Element-98-Frame" tabindex="0"></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-98">\Delta{p}</script> of a football thrown by Tom Brady during the superbowl traveling at <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-137"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-138">40</span><span class="MJXp-mspace" id="MJXp-Span-139" style="width: 0.278em; height: 0em;"></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-140">m</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-141"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-142" style="margin-left: 0.111em; margin-right: 0.111em;">/</span></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-143">s</span></span></span><span class="MathJax MathJax_Processing" id="MathJax-Element-99-Frame" tabindex="0"></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-99">40\; m/s</script> is <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-144"><span class="MJXp-mtext" id="MJXp-Span-145">&nbsp;</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-146">1</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-147" style="margin-left: 0.267em; margin-right: 0.267em;">×</span><span class="MJXp-msubsup" id="MJXp-Span-148"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-149" style="margin-right: 0.05em;">10</span><span class="MJXp-mrow MJXp-script" id="MJXp-Span-150" style="vertical-align: 0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-151">−</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-152">6</span></span></span></span></span><span class="MathJax MathJax_Processing" id="MathJax-Element-100-Frame" tabindex="0"></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-100">\ 1 \times 10^{-6}</script> of its momentum. What is its uncertainty in position <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-153"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-154">Δ</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-155"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-156">x</span></span></span></span><span class="MathJax MathJax_Processing" id="MathJax-Element-101-Frame" tabindex="0"></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-101">\Delta{x}</script>? Mass=0.40kg</li>
    <li class="lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;">You notice there is 2 mL of water traveling on the football at the same speed and <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-157"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-158">Δ</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-159"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-160">p</span></span></span></span><span class="MathJax MathJax_Processing" id="MathJax-Element-102-Frame" tabindex="0"></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-102">\Delta{p}</script>. Calculate its <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-161"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-162">Δ</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-163"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-164">x</span></span></span></span><span class="MathJax MathJax_Processing" id="MathJax-Element-103-Frame" tabindex="0"></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-103">\Delta{x}</script>.</li>
    <li class="lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;">An electron in that molecule of water traveling at the same speed has the same <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-165"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-166">Δ</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-167"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-168">p</span></span></span></span><span class="MathJax MathJax_Processing" id="MathJax-Element-104-Frame" tabindex="0"></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-104">\Delta{p}</script>. Calculate its <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-169"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-170">Δ</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-171"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-172">x</span></span></span></span><span class="MathJax MathJax_Processing" id="MathJax-Element-105-Frame" tabindex="0"></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-105">\Delta{x}</script> if the mass of an electron is <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-173"><span class="MJXp-mtext" id="MJXp-Span-174">&nbsp;</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-175">9.1</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-176" style="margin-left: 0.267em; margin-right: 0.267em;">×</span><span class="MJXp-msubsup" id="MJXp-Span-177"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-178" style="margin-right: 0.05em;">10</span><span class="MJXp-mrow MJXp-script" id="MJXp-Span-179" style="vertical-align: 0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-180">−</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-181">31</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-182">k</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-183">g</span></span></span><span class="MathJax MathJax_Processing" id="MathJax-Element-106-Frame" tabindex="0"></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-106">\ 9.1 \times 10^{-31} kg</script>.</li>
    <li class="lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;">Comment on the differences in the uncertainty of momentum between the ball, water, and electron. How does the mass effect this value?</li>
    <li class="lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;">Taking into account all of the information presented above, can you state a situation in which the Heisenberg Uncertainty Principle has little effect on measuring the momentum and position of one object, but dominates for that of another when both objects are part of the same system?</li>
</ol>

</div><div mt-section-origin="Bookshelves/Physical_and_Theoretical_Chemistry_Textbook_Maps/Supplemental_Modules_(Physical_and_Theoretical_Chemistry)/Quantum_Mechanics/02._Fundamental_Concepts_of_Quantum_Mechanics/Heisenberg's_Uncertainty_Principle" class="mt-section" id="section_5"><span id="Answers"></span><h2 class="lt-chem-1693 editable" style="background-color: unset;">Answers</h2>

<p class="lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;">1.</p>

<p class="mt-align-center lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math MJXp-display" id="MJXp-Span-184"><span class="MJXp-mtable" id="MJXp-Span-185"><span><span class="MJXp-mtr" id="MJXp-Span-186" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-187" style="text-align: right;"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-188">p</span></span><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-189" style="padding-left: 0em; text-align: left;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-190"></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-191" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">=</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-192">m</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-193">v</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mtr" id="MJXp-Span-194" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-195" style="padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: right;"></span><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-196" style="padding-left: 0em; padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: left;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-197"></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-198" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">=</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-199" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0em;">(</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-200">0.40</span><span class="MJXp-mspace" id="MJXp-Span-201" style="width: 0.167em; height: 0em;"></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-202">k</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-203">g</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-204" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0em;">)</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-205" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0em;">(</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-206">40</span><span class="MJXp-mspace" id="MJXp-Span-207" style="width: 0.167em; height: 0em;"></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-208">m</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-209"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-210" style="margin-left: 0.111em; margin-right: 0.111em;">/</span></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-211">s</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-212" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0em;">)</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mtr" id="MJXp-Span-213" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-214" style="padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: right;"></span><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-215" style="padding-left: 0em; padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: left;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-216"></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-217" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">=</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-218">16</span><span class="MJXp-mspace" id="MJXp-Span-219" style="width: 0.167em; height: 0em;"></span><span class="MJXp-mstyle" id="MJXp-Span-220"><span class="MJXp-mfrac" id="MJXp-Span-221" style="vertical-align: 0.25em;"><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-222">k</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-223">g</span><span class="MJXp-mspace" id="MJXp-Span-224" style="width: 0.167em; height: 0em;"></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-225">m</span></span><span class="MJXp-box" style="margin-top: -0.9em;"><span class="MJXp-denom"><span><span class="MJXp-rule" style="height: 1em; border-top: none; border-bottom: 1px solid; margin: 0.1em 0px;"></span></span><span><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-226">s</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><div class="MathJax_Display MathJax_Processing"><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-107-Frame" tabindex="0"></span></div><script type="math/tex; mode=display" id="MathJax-Element-107"> \begin{align} p&=mv\nonumber \\[4pt] &= (0.40\, kg)(40\,m/s)\nonumber \\[4pt] &= 16\,\dfrac{kg \, m}{s}\nonumber \end{align} \nonumber</script></p>

<p class="mt-align-center lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math MJXp-display" id="MJXp-Span-227"><span class="MJXp-mtable" id="MJXp-Span-228"><span><span class="MJXp-mtr" id="MJXp-Span-229" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-230" style="text-align: right;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-231">Δ</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-232"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-233">p</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-234" style="padding-left: 0em; text-align: left;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-235"></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-236" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">=</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-237">p</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-238" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0em;">(</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-239">1</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-240" style="margin-left: 0.267em; margin-right: 0.267em;">×</span><span class="MJXp-msubsup" id="MJXp-Span-241"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-242" style="margin-right: 0.05em;">10</span><span class="MJXp-mrow MJXp-script" id="MJXp-Span-243" style="vertical-align: 0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-244">−</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-245">6</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-246" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0em;">)</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mtr" id="MJXp-Span-247" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-248" style="padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: right;"></span><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-249" style="padding-left: 0em; padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: left;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-250"></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-251" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">=</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-252">16</span><span class="MJXp-mstyle" id="MJXp-Span-253"><span class="MJXp-mfrac" id="MJXp-Span-254" style="vertical-align: 0.25em;"><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-255">k</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-256">g</span><span class="MJXp-mspace" id="MJXp-Span-257" style="width: 0.167em; height: 0em;"></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-258">m</span></span><span class="MJXp-box" style="margin-top: -0.9em;"><span class="MJXp-denom"><span><span class="MJXp-rule" style="height: 1em; border-top: none; border-bottom: 1px solid; margin: 0.1em 0px;"></span></span><span><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-259">s</span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-260" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0em;">(</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-261">1</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-262" style="margin-left: 0.267em; margin-right: 0.267em;">×</span><span class="MJXp-msubsup" id="MJXp-Span-263"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-264" style="margin-right: 0.05em;">10</span><span class="MJXp-mrow MJXp-script" id="MJXp-Span-265" style="vertical-align: 0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-266">−</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-267">6</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-268" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0em;">)</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mtr" id="MJXp-Span-269" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-270" style="padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: right;"></span><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-271" style="padding-left: 0em; padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: left;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-272"></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-273" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">=</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-274">16</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-275" style="margin-left: 0.267em; margin-right: 0.267em;">×</span><span class="MJXp-msubsup" id="MJXp-Span-276"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-277" style="margin-right: 0.05em;">10</span><span class="MJXp-mrow MJXp-script" id="MJXp-Span-278" style="vertical-align: 0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-279">−</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-280">6</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mstyle" id="MJXp-Span-281"><span class="MJXp-mfrac" id="MJXp-Span-282" style="vertical-align: 0.25em;"><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-283">k</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-284">g</span><span class="MJXp-mspace" id="MJXp-Span-285" style="width: 0.167em; height: 0em;"></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-286">m</span></span><span class="MJXp-box" style="margin-top: -0.9em;"><span class="MJXp-denom"><span><span class="MJXp-rule" style="height: 1em; border-top: none; border-bottom: 1px solid; margin: 0.1em 0px;"></span></span><span><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-287">s</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><div class="MathJax_Display MathJax_Processing"><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-108-Frame" tabindex="0"></span></div><script type="math/tex; mode=display" id="MathJax-Element-108"> \begin{align} \Delta{p} &= p (1 \times 10^{-6})\nonumber \\[4pt] &=16\dfrac{kg \, m}{s} (1 \times 10^{-6})\nonumber \\[4pt] &=16 \times 10^{-6}\dfrac{kg \, m}{s}\nonumber \end{align} \nonumber</script></p>

<p class="mt-align-center lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math MJXp-display" id="MJXp-Span-288"><span class="MJXp-mtable" id="MJXp-Span-289"><span><span class="MJXp-mtr" id="MJXp-Span-290" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-291" style="text-align: right;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-292">Δ</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-293"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-294">p</span></span><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-295">Δ</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-296"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-297">x</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-298" style="padding-left: 0em; text-align: left;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-299"></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-300" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">≥</span><span class="MJXp-mstyle" id="MJXp-Span-301"><span class="MJXp-mfrac" id="MJXp-Span-302" style="vertical-align: 0.25em;"><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-303">h</span></span><span class="MJXp-box" style="margin-top: -0.9em;"><span class="MJXp-denom"><span><span class="MJXp-rule" style="height: 1em; border-top: none; border-bottom: 1px solid; margin: 0.1em 0px;"></span></span><span><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-304">4</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-305">π</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mtr" id="MJXp-Span-306" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-307" style="padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: right;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-308">Δ</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-309"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-310">x</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-311" style="padding-left: 0em; padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: left;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-312"></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-313" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">≥</span><span class="MJXp-mstyle" id="MJXp-Span-314"><span class="MJXp-mfrac" id="MJXp-Span-315" style="vertical-align: 0.25em;"><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-316">h</span></span><span class="MJXp-box" style="margin-top: -0.9em;"><span class="MJXp-denom"><span><span class="MJXp-rule" style="height: 1em; border-top: none; border-bottom: 1px solid; margin: 0.1em 0px;"></span></span><span><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-317">4</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-318">π</span><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-319">Δ</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-320"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-321">p</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mtr" id="MJXp-Span-322" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-323" style="padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: right;"></span><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-324" style="padding-left: 0em; padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: left;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-325"></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-326" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">≥</span><span class="MJXp-mstyle" id="MJXp-Span-327"><span class="MJXp-mfrac" id="MJXp-Span-328" style="vertical-align: 0.25em;"><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-329">6.626</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-330" style="margin-left: 0.267em; margin-right: 0.267em;">×</span><span class="MJXp-msubsup" id="MJXp-Span-331"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-332" style="margin-right: 0.05em;">10</span><span class="MJXp-mrow MJXp-script" id="MJXp-Span-333" style="vertical-align: 0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-334">−</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-335">34</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-336">J</span><span class="MJXp-mspace" id="MJXp-Span-337" style="width: 0.167em; height: 0em;"></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-338">s</span></span><span class="MJXp-box" style="margin-top: -0.9em;"><span class="MJXp-denom"><span><span class="MJXp-rule" style="height: 1em; border-top: none; border-bottom: 1px solid; margin: 0.1em 0px;"></span></span><span><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-339">4</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-340">π</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-341"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-342" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0em; vertical-align: -0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-right MJXp-scale5" style="font-size: 3em; margin-left: -0.13em;">(</span></span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-343">16</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-344" style="margin-left: 0.267em; margin-right: 0.267em;">×</span><span class="MJXp-msubsup" id="MJXp-Span-345"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-346" style="margin-right: 0.05em;">10</span><span class="MJXp-mrow MJXp-script" id="MJXp-Span-347" style="vertical-align: 0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-348">−</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-349">6</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mstyle" id="MJXp-Span-350"><span class="MJXp-mfrac" id="MJXp-Span-351" style="vertical-align: 0.25em;"><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-352">k</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-353">g</span><span class="MJXp-mspace" id="MJXp-Span-354" style="width: 0.167em; height: 0em;"></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-355">m</span></span><span class="MJXp-box" style="margin-top: -0.9em;"><span class="MJXp-denom"><span><span class="MJXp-rule" style="height: 1em; border-top: none; border-bottom: 1px solid; margin: 0.1em 0px;"></span></span><span><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-356">s</span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-357" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0em; vertical-align: -0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-right MJXp-scale5" style="font-size: 3em; margin-left: -0.13em;">)</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mtr" id="MJXp-Span-358" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-359" style="padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: right;"></span><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-360" style="padding-left: 0em; padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: left;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-361"></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-362" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">≥</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-363">3.3</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-364" style="margin-left: 0.267em; margin-right: 0.267em;">×</span><span class="MJXp-msubsup" id="MJXp-Span-365"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-366" style="margin-right: 0.05em;">10</span><span class="MJXp-mrow MJXp-script" id="MJXp-Span-367" style="vertical-align: 0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-368">−</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-369">30</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-370">m</span></span></span></span></span></span></span><div class="MathJax_Display MathJax_Processing"><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-109-Frame" tabindex="0"></span></div><script type="math/tex; mode=display" id="MathJax-Element-109"> \begin{align} \Delta{p}\Delta{x} & \ge \dfrac{h}{4\pi} \nonumber \\[4pt] \Delta{x} &\ge \dfrac{h}{4\pi\Delta{p}} \nonumber \\[4pt] &\ge \dfrac{6.626 \times 10^{-34}J \,s}{4\pi \left(16 \times 10^{-6}\dfrac{kg \, m}{s}\right)}\nonumber \\[4pt] &\ge 3.3 \times 10^{-30}m\nonumber \end{align} \nonumber</script></p>

<p class="lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;">Note that <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-371"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-372">1</span><span class="MJXp-mspace" id="MJXp-Span-373" style="width: 0.167em; height: 0em;"></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-374">J</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-375" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">=</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-376">1</span><span class="MJXp-mstyle" id="MJXp-Span-377"><span class="MJXp-mfrac" id="MJXp-Span-378" style="vertical-align: 0.25em;"><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-379">k</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-380">g</span><span class="MJXp-mspace" id="MJXp-Span-381" style="width: 0.167em; height: 0em;"></span><span class="MJXp-msubsup" id="MJXp-Span-382"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-383" style="margin-right: 0.05em;">m</span><span class="MJXp-mn MJXp-script" id="MJXp-Span-384" style="vertical-align: 0.5em;">2</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-box" style="margin-top: -0.9em;"><span class="MJXp-denom"><span><span class="MJXp-rule" style="height: 1em; border-top: none; border-bottom: 1px solid; margin: 0.1em 0px;"></span></span><span><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-msubsup" id="MJXp-Span-385"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-386" style="margin-right: 0.05em;">s</span><span class="MJXp-mn MJXp-script" id="MJXp-Span-387" style="vertical-align: 0.5em;">2</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="MathJax MathJax_Processing" id="MathJax-Element-110-Frame" tabindex="0"></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-110">1\,J = 1 \dfrac{kg \, m^2}{s^2}</script>.</p>

<p class="lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;">2.</p>

<p class="lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;">The volume is not the property that matters, but the mass. So convert to mass with density.</p>

<p class="mt-align-center lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math MJXp-display" id="MJXp-Span-388"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-389" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0em;">(</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-390">2</span><span class="MJXp-mspace" id="MJXp-Span-391" style="width: 0.167em; height: 0em;"></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-392">m</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-393">L</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-394" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0em;">)</span><span class="MJXp-munderover" id="MJXp-Span-395"><span class=""><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-396"><span class="MJXp-munderover" id="MJXp-Span-397"><span class=""><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-398"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-399" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0em; vertical-align: -0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-right MJXp-scale5" style="font-size: 3em; margin-left: -0.13em;">(</span></span><span class="MJXp-mstyle" id="MJXp-Span-400"><span class="MJXp-mfrac" id="MJXp-Span-401" style="vertical-align: 0.25em;"><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-402">1</span><span class="MJXp-mspace" id="MJXp-Span-403" style="width: 0.167em; height: 0em;"></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-404">g</span></span><span class="MJXp-box" style="margin-top: -0.9em;"><span class="MJXp-denom"><span><span class="MJXp-rule" style="height: 1em; border-top: none; border-bottom: 1px solid; margin: 0.1em 0px;"></span></span><span><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-405">1</span><span class="MJXp-mspace" id="MJXp-Span-406" style="width: 0.167em; height: 0em;"></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-407">m</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-408">L</span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-409" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0em; vertical-align: -0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-right MJXp-scale5" style="font-size: 3em; margin-left: -0.13em;">)</span></span></span></span><span class=""><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-410" style="margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 0em;">⏟</span></span></span></span></span><span class=" MJXp-script"><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-411" style="margin-left: 0px;"><span class="MJXp-mtext" id="MJXp-Span-412">density of water</span></span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-413"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-414" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0em; vertical-align: -0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-right MJXp-scale5" style="font-size: 3em; margin-left: -0.13em;">(</span></span><span class="MJXp-mstyle" id="MJXp-Span-415"><span class="MJXp-mfrac" id="MJXp-Span-416" style="vertical-align: 0.25em;"><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-417">1</span><span class="MJXp-mspace" id="MJXp-Span-418" style="width: 0.167em; height: 0em;"></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-419">k</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-420">g</span></span><span class="MJXp-box" style="margin-top: -0.9em;"><span class="MJXp-denom"><span><span class="MJXp-rule" style="height: 1em; border-top: none; border-bottom: 1px solid; margin: 0.1em 0px;"></span></span><span><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-421">1</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-422" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0.222em;">,</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-423">000</span><span class="MJXp-mspace" id="MJXp-Span-424" style="width: 0.167em; height: 0em;"></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-425">g</span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-426" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0em; vertical-align: -0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-right MJXp-scale5" style="font-size: 3em; margin-left: -0.13em;">)</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-427" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">=</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-428">2</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-429" style="margin-left: 0.267em; margin-right: 0.267em;">×</span><span class="MJXp-msubsup" id="MJXp-Span-430"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-431" style="margin-right: 0.05em;">10</span><span class="MJXp-mrow MJXp-script" id="MJXp-Span-432" style="vertical-align: 0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-433">−</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-434">3</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-435">k</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-436">g</span></span></span><div class="MathJax_Display MathJax_Processing"><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-111-Frame" tabindex="0"></span></div><script type="math/tex; mode=display" id="MathJax-Element-111"> (2\, mL ) \underbrace{\left(\dfrac{1\,g}{1\,mL}\right)}_{\text{density of water}} \left(\dfrac{1\,kg}{1,000\,g}\right) =2 \times 10^{-3} kg \nonumber</script></p>

<p class="mt-align-center lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math MJXp-display" id="MJXp-Span-437"><span class="MJXp-mtable" id="MJXp-Span-438"><span><span class="MJXp-mtr" id="MJXp-Span-439" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-440" style="text-align: right;"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-441">p</span></span><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-442" style="padding-left: 0em; text-align: left;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-443"></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-444" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">=</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-445">m</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-446">v</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mtr" id="MJXp-Span-447" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-448" style="padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: right;"></span><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-449" style="padding-left: 0em; padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: left;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-450"></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-451" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">=</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-452" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0em;">(</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-453">2</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-454" style="margin-left: 0.267em; margin-right: 0.267em;">×</span><span class="MJXp-msubsup" id="MJXp-Span-455"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-456" style="margin-right: 0.05em;">10</span><span class="MJXp-mrow MJXp-script" id="MJXp-Span-457" style="vertical-align: 0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-458">−</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-459">3</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-460">k</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-461">g</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-462" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0em;">)</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-463" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0em;">(</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-464">40</span><span class="MJXp-mspace" id="MJXp-Span-465" style="width: 0.167em; height: 0em;"></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-466">m</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-467"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-468" style="margin-left: 0.111em; margin-right: 0.111em;">/</span></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-469">s</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-470" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0em;">)</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mtr" id="MJXp-Span-471" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-472" style="padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: right;"></span><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-473" style="padding-left: 0em; padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: left;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-474"></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-475" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">=</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-476">8</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-477" style="margin-left: 0.267em; margin-right: 0.267em;">×</span><span class="MJXp-msubsup" id="MJXp-Span-478"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-479" style="margin-right: 0.05em;">10</span><span class="MJXp-mrow MJXp-script" id="MJXp-Span-480" style="vertical-align: 0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-481">−</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-482">2</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mstyle" id="MJXp-Span-483"><span class="MJXp-mfrac" id="MJXp-Span-484" style="vertical-align: 0.25em;"><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-485">k</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-486">g</span><span class="MJXp-mspace" id="MJXp-Span-487" style="width: 0.167em; height: 0em;"></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-488">m</span></span><span class="MJXp-box" style="margin-top: -0.9em;"><span class="MJXp-denom"><span><span class="MJXp-rule" style="height: 1em; border-top: none; border-bottom: 1px solid; margin: 0.1em 0px;"></span></span><span><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-489">s</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><div class="MathJax_Display MathJax_Processing"><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-112-Frame" tabindex="0"></span></div><script type="math/tex; mode=display" id="MathJax-Element-112"> \begin{align} p&=m v\nonumber \\[4pt] &= (2 \times 10^{-3} kg)(40\,m/s)\nonumber \\[4pt] &= 8 \times 10^{-2}\dfrac{kg \, m}{s}\nonumber \end{align} \nonumber</script></p>

<p class="mt-align-center lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math MJXp-display" id="MJXp-Span-490"><span class="MJXp-mtable" id="MJXp-Span-491"><span><span class="MJXp-mtr" id="MJXp-Span-492" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-493" style="text-align: right;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-494">Δ</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-495"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-496">p</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-497" style="padding-left: 0em; text-align: left;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-498"></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-499" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">=</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-500">p</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-501" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0em;">(</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-502">1</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-503" style="margin-left: 0.267em; margin-right: 0.267em;">×</span><span class="MJXp-msubsup" id="MJXp-Span-504"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-505" style="margin-right: 0.05em;">10</span><span class="MJXp-mrow MJXp-script" id="MJXp-Span-506" style="vertical-align: 0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-507">−</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-508">6</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-509" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0em;">)</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-510" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">=</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-511" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0em;">(</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-512">8</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-513" style="margin-left: 0.267em; margin-right: 0.267em;">×</span><span class="MJXp-msubsup" id="MJXp-Span-514"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-515" style="margin-right: 0.05em;">10</span><span class="MJXp-mrow MJXp-script" id="MJXp-Span-516" style="vertical-align: 0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-517">−</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-518">2</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mstyle" id="MJXp-Span-519"><span class="MJXp-mfrac" id="MJXp-Span-520" style="vertical-align: 0.25em;"><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-521">k</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-522">g</span><span class="MJXp-mspace" id="MJXp-Span-523" style="width: 0.167em; height: 0em;"></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-524">m</span></span><span class="MJXp-box" style="margin-top: -0.9em;"><span class="MJXp-denom"><span><span class="MJXp-rule" style="height: 1em; border-top: none; border-bottom: 1px solid; margin: 0.1em 0px;"></span></span><span><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-525">s</span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-526" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0em;">)</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-527" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0em;">(</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-528">1</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-529" style="margin-left: 0.267em; margin-right: 0.267em;">×</span><span class="MJXp-msubsup" id="MJXp-Span-530"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-531" style="margin-right: 0.05em;">10</span><span class="MJXp-mrow MJXp-script" id="MJXp-Span-532" style="vertical-align: 0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-533">−</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-534">6</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-535" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0em;">)</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-536" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">=</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-537">8</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-538" style="margin-left: 0.267em; margin-right: 0.267em;">×</span><span class="MJXp-msubsup" id="MJXp-Span-539"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-540" style="margin-right: 0.05em;">10</span><span class="MJXp-mrow MJXp-script" id="MJXp-Span-541" style="vertical-align: 0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-542">−</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-543">8</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mstyle" id="MJXp-Span-544"><span class="MJXp-mfrac" id="MJXp-Span-545" style="vertical-align: 0.25em;"><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-546">k</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-547">g</span><span class="MJXp-mspace" id="MJXp-Span-548" style="width: 0.167em; height: 0em;"></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-549">m</span></span><span class="MJXp-box" style="margin-top: -0.9em;"><span class="MJXp-denom"><span><span class="MJXp-rule" style="height: 1em; border-top: none; border-bottom: 1px solid; margin: 0.1em 0px;"></span></span><span><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-550">s</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><div class="MathJax_Display MathJax_Processing"><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-113-Frame" tabindex="0"></span></div><script type="math/tex; mode=display" id="MathJax-Element-113"> \begin{align} \Delta{p} &=p (1 \times 10^{-6}) = (8 \times 10^{-2} \dfrac{kg \, m}{s})(1 \times 10^{-6}) = 8 \times 10^{-8} \dfrac{kg \, m}{s} \nonumber \end{align} \nonumber</script></p>

<p class="mt-align-center lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math MJXp-display" id="MJXp-Span-551"><span class="MJXp-mtable" id="MJXp-Span-552"><span><span class="MJXp-mlabeledtr" id="MJXp-Span-553" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-554" style="text-align: right;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-555">Δ</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-556"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-557">p</span></span><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-558">Δ</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-559"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-560">x</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-561" style="padding-left: 0em; text-align: left;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-562"></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-563" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">≥</span><span class="MJXp-mstyle" id="MJXp-Span-564"><span class="MJXp-mfrac" id="MJXp-Span-565" style="vertical-align: 0.25em;"><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-566">h</span></span><span class="MJXp-box" style="margin-top: -0.9em;"><span class="MJXp-denom"><span><span class="MJXp-rule" style="height: 1em; border-top: none; border-bottom: 1px solid; margin: 0.1em 0px;"></span></span><span><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-567">4</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-568">π</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mtr" id="MJXp-Span-569" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-570" style="padding-top: 0.3em; text-align: right;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-571">Δ</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-572"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-573">x</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-574" style="padding-left: 0em; padding-top: 0.3em; text-align: left;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-575"></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-576" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">≥</span><span class="MJXp-mstyle" id="MJXp-Span-577"><span class="MJXp-mfrac" id="MJXp-Span-578" style="vertical-align: 0.25em;"><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-579">h</span></span><span class="MJXp-box" style="margin-top: -0.9em;"><span class="MJXp-denom"><span><span class="MJXp-rule" style="height: 1em; border-top: none; border-bottom: 1px solid; margin: 0.1em 0px;"></span></span><span><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-580">4</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-581">π</span><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-582">Δ</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-583"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-584">p</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mtr" id="MJXp-Span-585" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-586" style="padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: right;"></span><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-587" style="padding-left: 0em; padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: left;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-588"></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-589" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">≥</span><span class="MJXp-mstyle" id="MJXp-Span-590"><span class="MJXp-mfrac" id="MJXp-Span-591" style="vertical-align: 0.25em;"><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-592">6.626</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-593" style="margin-left: 0.267em; margin-right: 0.267em;">×</span><span class="MJXp-msubsup" id="MJXp-Span-594"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-595" style="margin-right: 0.05em;">10</span><span class="MJXp-mrow MJXp-script" id="MJXp-Span-596" style="vertical-align: 0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-597">−</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-598">34</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-599">J</span><span class="MJXp-mspace" id="MJXp-Span-600" style="width: 0.167em; height: 0em;"></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-601">s</span></span><span class="MJXp-box" style="margin-top: -0.9em;"><span class="MJXp-denom"><span><span class="MJXp-rule" style="height: 1em; border-top: none; border-bottom: 1px solid; margin: 0.1em 0px;"></span></span><span><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-602">4</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-603">π</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-604"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-605" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0em; vertical-align: -0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-right MJXp-scale5" style="font-size: 3em; margin-left: -0.13em;">(</span></span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-606">8</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-607" style="margin-left: 0.267em; margin-right: 0.267em;">×</span><span class="MJXp-msubsup" id="MJXp-Span-608"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-609" style="margin-right: 0.05em;">10</span><span class="MJXp-mrow MJXp-script" id="MJXp-Span-610" style="vertical-align: 0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-611">−</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-612">8</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mstyle" id="MJXp-Span-613"><span class="MJXp-mfrac" id="MJXp-Span-614" style="vertical-align: 0.25em;"><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-615">k</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-616">g</span><span class="MJXp-mspace" id="MJXp-Span-617" style="width: 0.167em; height: 0em;"></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-618">m</span></span><span class="MJXp-box" style="margin-top: -0.9em;"><span class="MJXp-denom"><span><span class="MJXp-rule" style="height: 1em; border-top: none; border-bottom: 1px solid; margin: 0.1em 0px;"></span></span><span><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-619">s</span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-620" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0em; vertical-align: -0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-right MJXp-scale5" style="font-size: 3em; margin-left: -0.13em;">)</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mtr" id="MJXp-Span-621" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-622" style="padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: right;"></span><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-623" style="padding-left: 0em; padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: left;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-624"></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-625" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">≥</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-626">6.6</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-627" style="margin-left: 0.267em; margin-right: 0.267em;">×</span><span class="MJXp-msubsup" id="MJXp-Span-628"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-629" style="margin-right: 0.05em;">10</span><span class="MJXp-mrow MJXp-script" id="MJXp-Span-630" style="vertical-align: 0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-631">−</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-632">28</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-633">m</span></span></span></span></span></span></span><div class="MathJax_Display MathJax_Processing"><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-114-Frame" tabindex="0"></span></div><script type="math/tex;
