mode=display" id="MathJax-Element-114"> \begin{align} \Delta{p}\Delta{x} &\ge \dfrac{h}{4\pi} \\ \Delta{x} &\ge \dfrac{h}{4\pi\Delta{p}} \nonumber \\[4pt] &\ge \dfrac{6.626 \times 10^{-34} J \, s}{4\pi \left(8 \times 10^{-8} \dfrac{kg \, m}{s}\right)}\nonumber \\[4pt] &\ge 6.6 \times 10^{-28}m \nonumber \end{align} \nonumber</script></p>

<p class="lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;">3</p>

<p class="mt-align-center lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math MJXp-display" id="MJXp-Span-634"><span class="MJXp-mtable" id="MJXp-Span-635"><span><span class="MJXp-mtr" id="MJXp-Span-636" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-637" style="text-align: right;"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-638">p</span></span><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-639" style="padding-left: 0em; text-align: left;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-640"></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-641" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">=</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-642">m</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-643">v</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mtr" id="MJXp-Span-644" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-645" style="padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: right;"></span><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-646" style="padding-left: 0em; padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: left;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-647"></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-648" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">=</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-649" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0em;">(</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-650">9.1</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-651" style="margin-left: 0.267em; margin-right: 0.267em;">×</span><span class="MJXp-msubsup" id="MJXp-Span-652"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-653" style="margin-right: 0.05em;">10</span><span class="MJXp-mrow MJXp-script" id="MJXp-Span-654" style="vertical-align: 0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-655">−</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-656">31</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-657">k</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-658">g</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-659" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0em;">)</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-660" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0em;">(</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-661">40</span><span class="MJXp-mspace" id="MJXp-Span-662" style="width: 0.167em; height: 0em;"></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-663">m</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-664"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-665" style="margin-left: 0.111em; margin-right: 0.111em;">/</span></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-666">s</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-667" style="margin-left: 0em; margin-right: 0em;">)</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mtr" id="MJXp-Span-668" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-669" style="padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: right;"></span><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-670" style="padding-left: 0em; padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: left;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-671"></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-672" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">=</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-673">3.6</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-674" style="margin-left: 0.267em; margin-right: 0.267em;">×</span><span class="MJXp-msubsup" id="MJXp-Span-675"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-676" style="margin-right: 0.05em;">10</span><span class="MJXp-mrow MJXp-script" id="MJXp-Span-677" style="vertical-align: 0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-678">−</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-679">29</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mstyle" id="MJXp-Span-680"><span class="MJXp-mfrac" id="MJXp-Span-681" style="vertical-align: 0.25em;"><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-682">k</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-683">g</span><span class="MJXp-mspace" id="MJXp-Span-684" style="width: 0.167em; height: 0em;"></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-685">m</span></span><span class="MJXp-box" style="margin-top: -0.9em;"><span class="MJXp-denom"><span><span class="MJXp-rule" style="height: 1em; border-top: none; border-bottom: 1px solid; margin: 0.1em 0px;"></span></span><span><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-686">s</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><div class="MathJax_Display MathJax_Processing"><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-115-Frame" tabindex="0"></span></div><script type="math/tex; mode=display" id="MathJax-Element-115"> \begin{align} p&=m v \nonumber \\[4pt]&= (9.1 \times 10^{-31}kg)(40\,m/s) \nonumber \\[4pt] &= 3.6 \times 10^{-29}\dfrac{kg \, m}{s} \nonumber \end{align} \nonumber</script></p>

<p class="mt-align-center lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math MJXp-display" id="MJXp-Span-687"><span class="MJXp-mtable" id="MJXp-Span-688"><span><span class="MJXp-mtr" id="MJXp-Span-689" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-690" style="text-align: right;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-691">Δ</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-692"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-693">p</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-694" style="padding-left: 0em; text-align: left;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-695"></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-696" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">=</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-697">p</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-698" style="margin-left: 0.267em; margin-right: 0.267em;">×</span><span class="MJXp-msubsup" id="MJXp-Span-699"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-700" style="margin-right: 0.05em;">10</span><span class="MJXp-mrow MJXp-script" id="MJXp-Span-701" style="vertical-align: 0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-702">−</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-703">6</span></span></span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mtr" id="MJXp-Span-704" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-705" style="padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: right;"></span><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-706" style="padding-left: 0em; padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: left;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-707"></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-708" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">=</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-709">3.6</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-710" style="margin-left: 0.267em; margin-right: 0.267em;">×</span><span class="MJXp-msubsup" id="MJXp-Span-711"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-712" style="margin-right: 0.05em;">10</span><span class="MJXp-mrow MJXp-script" id="MJXp-Span-713" style="vertical-align: 0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-714">−</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-715">29</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mstyle" id="MJXp-Span-716"><span class="MJXp-mfrac" id="MJXp-Span-717" style="vertical-align: 0.25em;"><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-718">k</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-719">g</span><span class="MJXp-mspace" id="MJXp-Span-720" style="width: 0.167em; height: 0em;"></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-721">m</span></span><span class="MJXp-box" style="margin-top: -0.9em;"><span class="MJXp-denom"><span><span class="MJXp-rule" style="height: 1em; border-top: none; border-bottom: 1px solid; margin: 0.1em 0px;"></span></span><span><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-722">s</span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-723" style="margin-left: 0.267em; margin-right: 0.267em;">×</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-724">1</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-725" style="margin-left: 0.267em; margin-right: 0.267em;">×</span><span class="MJXp-msubsup" id="MJXp-Span-726"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-727" style="margin-right: 0.05em;">10</span><span class="MJXp-mrow MJXp-script" id="MJXp-Span-728" style="vertical-align: 0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-729">−</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-730">6</span></span></span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mtr" id="MJXp-Span-731" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-732" style="padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: right;"></span><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-733" style="padding-left: 0em; padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: left;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-734"></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-735" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">=</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-736">3.6</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-737" style="margin-left: 0.267em; margin-right: 0.267em;">×</span><span class="MJXp-msubsup" id="MJXp-Span-738"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-739" style="margin-right: 0.05em;">10</span><span class="MJXp-mrow MJXp-script" id="MJXp-Span-740" style="vertical-align: 0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-741">−</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-742">35</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mstyle" id="MJXp-Span-743"><span class="MJXp-mfrac" id="MJXp-Span-744" style="vertical-align: 0.25em;"><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-745">k</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-746">g</span><span class="MJXp-mspace" id="MJXp-Span-747" style="width: 0.167em; height: 0em;"></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-748">m</span></span><span class="MJXp-box" style="margin-top: -0.9em;"><span class="MJXp-denom"><span><span class="MJXp-rule" style="height: 1em; border-top: none; border-bottom: 1px solid; margin: 0.1em 0px;"></span></span><span><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-749">s</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><div class="MathJax_Display MathJax_Processing"><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-116-Frame" tabindex="0"></span></div><script type="math/tex; mode=display" id="MathJax-Element-116"> \begin{align}\Delta{p} &= p \times 10^{-6} \nonumber \\[4pt] &= 3.6 \times 10^{-29}\dfrac{kg \, m}{s} \times 1 \times 10^{-6} \nonumber \\[4pt] &= 3.6 \times 10^{-35} \dfrac{kg \, m}{s} \nonumber \end{align} \nonumber</script></p>

<p class="mt-align-center lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math MJXp-display" id="MJXp-Span-750"><span class="MJXp-mtable" id="MJXp-Span-751"><span><span class="MJXp-mtr" id="MJXp-Span-752" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-753" style="text-align: right;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-754">Δ</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-755"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-756">p</span></span><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-757">Δ</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-758"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-759">x</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-760" style="padding-left: 0em; text-align: left;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-761"></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-762" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">≥</span><span class="MJXp-mstyle" id="MJXp-Span-763"><span class="MJXp-mfrac" id="MJXp-Span-764" style="vertical-align: 0.25em;"><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-765">h</span></span><span class="MJXp-box" style="margin-top: -0.9em;"><span class="MJXp-denom"><span><span class="MJXp-rule" style="height: 1em; border-top: none; border-bottom: 1px solid; margin: 0.1em 0px;"></span></span><span><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-766">4</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-767">π</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mtr" id="MJXp-Span-768" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-769" style="padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: right;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-770">Δ</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-771"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-772">x</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-773" style="padding-left: 0em; padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: left;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-774"></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-775" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">≥</span><span class="MJXp-mstyle" id="MJXp-Span-776"><span class="MJXp-mfrac" id="MJXp-Span-777" style="vertical-align: 0.25em;"><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-778">h</span></span><span class="MJXp-box" style="margin-top: -0.9em;"><span class="MJXp-denom"><span><span class="MJXp-rule" style="height: 1em; border-top: none; border-bottom: 1px solid; margin: 0.1em 0px;"></span></span><span><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-779">4</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-780">π</span><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-781">Δ</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-782"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-783">p</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mtr" id="MJXp-Span-784" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-785" style="padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: right;"></span><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-786" style="padding-left: 0em; padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: left;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-787"></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-788" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">≥</span><span class="MJXp-mstyle" id="MJXp-Span-789"><span class="MJXp-mfrac" id="MJXp-Span-790" style="vertical-align: 0.25em;"><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-791">6.626</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-792" style="margin-left: 0.267em; margin-right: 0.267em;">×</span><span class="MJXp-msubsup" id="MJXp-Span-793"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-794" style="margin-right: 0.05em;">10</span><span class="MJXp-mrow MJXp-script" id="MJXp-Span-795" style="vertical-align: 0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-796">−</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-797">34</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-798">J</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-799" style="margin-left: 0.267em; margin-right: 0.267em;">×</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-800">s</span></span><span class="MJXp-box" style="margin-top: -0.9em;"><span class="MJXp-denom"><span><span class="MJXp-rule" style="height: 1em; border-top: none; border-bottom: 1px solid; margin: 0.1em 0px;"></span></span><span><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-801">4</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-802">π</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-803">3.6</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-804" style="margin-left: 0.267em; margin-right: 0.267em;">×</span><span class="MJXp-msubsup" id="MJXp-Span-805"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-806" style="margin-right: 0.05em;">10</span><span class="MJXp-mrow MJXp-script" id="MJXp-Span-807" style="vertical-align: 0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-808">−</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-809">35</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mstyle" id="MJXp-Span-810"><span class="MJXp-mfrac" id="MJXp-Span-811" style="vertical-align: 0.25em;"><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-812">k</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-813">g</span><span class="MJXp-mspace" id="MJXp-Span-814" style="width: 0.167em; height: 0em;"></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-815">m</span></span><span class="MJXp-box" style="margin-top: -0.9em;"><span class="MJXp-denom"><span><span class="MJXp-rule" style="height: 1em; border-top: none; border-bottom: 1px solid; margin: 0.1em 0px;"></span></span><span><span class="MJXp-box"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-816">s</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mtr" id="MJXp-Span-817" style="vertical-align: baseline;"><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-818" style="padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: right;"></span><span class="MJXp-mtd" id="MJXp-Span-819" style="padding-left: 0em; padding-top: 0.7em; text-align: left;"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-820"></span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-821" style="margin-left: 0.333em; margin-right: 0.333em;">≥</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-822">1.5</span><span class="MJXp-mspace" id="MJXp-Span-823" style="width: 0.167em; height: 0em;"></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-824">m</span></span></span></span></span></span></span><div class="MathJax_Display MathJax_Processing"><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-117-Frame" tabindex="0"></span></div><script type="math/tex; mode=display" id="MathJax-Element-117"> \begin{align} \Delta{p}\Delta{x} &\ge \dfrac{h}{4\pi} \nonumber \\[4pt] \Delta{x} &\ge \dfrac{h}{4\pi\Delta{p}} \nonumber \\[4pt] &\ge \dfrac{6.626 \times 10^{-34}J \times s}{4\pi 3.6 \times 10^{-35} \dfrac{kg \, m}{s}} \nonumber \\[4pt] &\ge1.5\,m \nonumber \end{align} \nonumber</script></p>

<p class="lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;">4</p>

<p class="lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;">The mass of the football is <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-825"><span class="MJXp-mtext" id="MJXp-Span-826">&nbsp;</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-827">4</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-828" style="margin-left: 0.267em; margin-right: 0.267em;">×</span><span class="MJXp-msubsup" id="MJXp-Span-829"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-830" style="margin-right: 0.05em;">10</span><span class="MJXp-mrow MJXp-script" id="MJXp-Span-831" style="vertical-align: 0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-832">−</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-833">1</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-834">k</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-835">g</span></span></span><span class="MathJax MathJax_Processing" id="MathJax-Element-118-Frame" tabindex="0"></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-118">\ 4 \times 10^{-1} kg</script>, the water is <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-836"><span class="MJXp-mtext" id="MJXp-Span-837">&nbsp;</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-838">2</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-839" style="margin-left: 0.267em; margin-right: 0.267em;">×</span><span class="MJXp-msubsup" id="MJXp-Span-840"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-841" style="margin-right: 0.05em;">10</span><span class="MJXp-mrow MJXp-script" id="MJXp-Span-842" style="vertical-align: 0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-843">−</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-844">3</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-845">k</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-846">g</span></span></span><span class="MathJax MathJax_Processing" id="MathJax-Element-119-Frame" tabindex="0"></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-119">\ 2 \times 10^{-3} kg</script>, and the electron is <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-847"><span class="MJXp-mtext" id="MJXp-Span-848">&nbsp;</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-849">9.1</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-850" style="margin-left: 0.267em; margin-right: 0.267em;">×</span><span class="MJXp-msubsup" id="MJXp-Span-851"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-852" style="margin-right: 0.05em;">10</span><span class="MJXp-mrow MJXp-script" id="MJXp-Span-853" style="vertical-align: 0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-854">−</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-855">31</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-856">k</span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-857">g</span></span></span><span class="MathJax MathJax_Processing" id="MathJax-Element-120-Frame" tabindex="0"></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-120">\ 9.1 \times 10^{-31} kg</script>. The mass of the water is 2 orders of magnitude smaller than that of the football, and the resulting position uncertainty is 2 orders of magnitude larger. Between the electron and water there is a difference of 28 orders of magnitude for both mass and <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-858"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-859">Δ</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-860"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-861">x</span></span></span></span><span class="MathJax MathJax_Processing" id="MathJax-Element-121-Frame" tabindex="0"></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-121">\Delta{x}</script>. There is a direct correlation of inverse proportionality between the <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-862"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-863">Δ</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-864"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-865">x</span></span></span></span><span class="MathJax MathJax_Processing" id="MathJax-Element-122-Frame" tabindex="0"></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-122">\Delta{x}</script> and <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-866"><span class="MJXp-mi" id="MJXp-Span-867">Δ</span><span class="MJXp-mrow" id="MJXp-Span-868"><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-869">p</span></span></span></span><span class="MathJax MathJax_Processing" id="MathJax-Element-123-Frame" tabindex="0"></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-123">\Delta{p}</script> as described by the Heisenberg Uncertainty Principle, and the much smaller electron has a larger position of uncertainty of 1.5 m compared to the larger football's of <span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;"><span class="MJXp-math" id="MJXp-Span-870"><span class="MJXp-mtext" id="MJXp-Span-871">&nbsp;</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-872">3.3</span><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-873" style="margin-left: 0.267em; margin-right: 0.267em;">×</span><span class="MJXp-msubsup" id="MJXp-Span-874"><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-875" style="margin-right: 0.05em;">10</span><span class="MJXp-mrow MJXp-script" id="MJXp-Span-876" style="vertical-align: 0.5em;"><span class="MJXp-mo" id="MJXp-Span-877">−</span><span class="MJXp-mn" id="MJXp-Span-878">30</span></span></span><span class="MJXp-mi MJXp-italic" id="MJXp-Span-879">m</span></span></span><span class="MathJax MathJax_Processing" id="MathJax-Element-124-Frame" tabindex="0"></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-124">\ 3.3 \times 10^{-30} m</script></p>

<p class="lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;">5</p>

<p class="lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;">One example that can be used is a glass of water in a cup holder inside a moving car. This glass of water has multiple water molecules each consisting of electrons. The water in the glass is a macroscopic object and can be viewed with the naked eye. The electrons however occupy the same space as the water, but cannot be seen and therefore must be measured microscopically. As stated above in the introduction, the effect of measuring a tiny particle causes a change in its momentum and time in space, but this is not the case for the larger object. Thus, the uncertainty principle has much greater bearing on the electrons rather than the macroscopic water.</p>



<div mt-section-origin="Bookshelves/Physical_and_Theoretical_Chemistry_Textbook_Maps/Supplemental_Modules_(Physical_and_Theoretical_Chemistry)/Quantum_Mechanics/02._Fundamental_Concepts_of_Quantum_Mechanics/Heisenberg's_Uncertainty_Principle" class="mt-section" id="section_6"><span id="References"></span><h2 class="lt-chem-1693 editable" style="background-color: unset;">References</h2>

<ol>
    <li class="lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;">Chang, Raymond. Physical Chemistry for the Biosciences. Sausalito California: University Science Books, 2005.</li>
    <li class="lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;">Mortimer, Robert G. Physical Chemistry. San Diego: Hardcourt Academic Press, 1993.</li>
    <li class="lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;">Knight, Randall.<span style=""> Physics for Scientists and Engineers: A Strategic Approach</span>. San Francisco: Addison Wesley, 2004.</li>
</ol>

</div><div mt-section-origin="Bookshelves/Physical_and_Theoretical_Chemistry_Textbook_Maps/Supplemental_Modules_(Physical_and_Theoretical_Chemistry)/Quantum_Mechanics/02._Fundamental_Concepts_of_Quantum_Mechanics/Heisenberg's_Uncertainty_Principle" class="mt-section" id="section_7"><span id="Contributors_and_Attributions"></span><h2 class="lt-chem-1693 editable" style="background-color: unset;">Contributors and Attributions</h2>

<ul>
    <li class="lt-chem-1693" style="background-color: unset;">Sarah Woods, Kris Baumgartner (UC Davis)</li>
</ul>
</div></div>

var front = "auto";
if(front=="auto"){
    front = "Heisenberg's Uncertainty Principle";
     if(front.includes(":")){
         front = front.split(":")[0];
         if(front.includes(".")){
             front = front.split(".");
             front = front.map((int)=>int.includes("0")?parseInt(int,10):int).join(".");
         }
         front+=".";
     }
     else {
     front = "";
     }
}
front = front.replace(/_/g," ");
MathJaxConfig = {
  TeX: {
     equationNumbers: {
        autoNumber: "all",
        formatNumber: function (n) {
            if(false){
                return front + (Number(n)+false);
            }
            else{return front + n;
            }
        }
     },
     macros: {
        PageIndex: ["{"+front+" #1}",1],
        test: ["{"+front+" #1}",1]
     },
     Macros: {
        PageIndex: ["{"+front+" #1}",1],
        test: ["{"+front+" #1}",1]
     },
     SVG: {
        linebreaks: { automatic: true }
     }
  }
};
